descriptionHTML:
Animated Widgets Clock & Weather are amazingly awesome animated widgets that will get a lot of “wows” from your friends. The clean, simple and beautiful widgets shows you the current weather for cities worldwide and the current time. The widgets use the latest android tools to animate the weather icons.

Features:

- Digital Clock
- Current weather conditions
- In widget animated weather icons
- Weather data received from global Meteorological broadcast services and more than 40 000 weather stations
- Celsius / Fahrenheit weather units
- Automatically detection of location
- Manual setting of the widget location
- Manual or automatic weather update
- Re-sizable widgets
- Transparent background
- Universal app made for tablets and phones! No need to purchase again
- Hot spots for alarm clock, weather refresh and widget configuration
- build only for ICS (built on sdk 17)
- multiple weather providers OWM and YR.NO (is the joint online weather service from the Norwegian Meteorological Institute and the Norwegian Broadcasting Corporation)

Permissions:
- android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
- android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
- android.permission.INTERNET

These are required for getting your local weather using networking & WIFI location services.

- com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM

Used to set the alarm when you press on the clock.

- com.android.vending.BILLING

Used for in app payments

For suggestions or bugs please contact us at: contact@tennumbers.com

If you want to translate the application to your language please contact us at: contact@tennumbers.com

topReviews.reviewText: What I was looking for have been using this for months, however there should be an option that allows us to upload our own background to the widget rather then using a solid color - overall 5 stars
Don't keep the time if it keep doing this gonna uninstail it
Great!!
Weather widgets are awesome.
Cool and smart
Cool
Like it so far
Love this launcher HTC M8
Smart

Wish pple would list phone etc, as they should do, so I know if it's buggy.. Anyway it's OK. One thing missing is "a feels like temp" There's a lot of difference in the actual temp and how it feels. A lot of other apps provide this. It would be 4/5 with it.
Surely you could of put more effort in to it than that? That is the last time I impulsively purchase from within an application as it is non-refundable
topReviews.reviewTitle: The animation is just a slideshow

topReviews.reviewText: Really good application but occasionally does not refresh and it can take about three hours to get it to refresh
Would prefer to get hourly weather per day for several days out instead of only the current day.
Doesn't refresh.  Temp not accurate.  The resizing is great. The widgets work separately so you can get both F and C is fantastic. Sucks that it doesn't work right.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Not as cool as I thought

topReviews.reviewText: I bought the paid version because I felt it was reasonably priced, but I'm not happy with the animations. Also, the accuracy isn't too good as the location would change from time to time even if I hadn't gone anywhere.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Not too bad but not very good

topReviews.reviewText: The best weather application I have come across
Great except for the insistence on being rated.
Very nice animated weather widget thats customizable. Has alot of good features! Highly recommend!!!
Animation stops after an hour or so and u must pay in order to make it work again!
Would appreciate more flexibility in tailoring the content of the widget
Widget looks good.  May have skins, but I haven't found them.  Needs local radar map, weather warnings, and 10 day forecast.  Then 5 stars
Nice widget nice color. Is cool app
What a crap no wdget have to pay them first
I actually paid for this app to get rid of the ads and within 20 mins of doing so the widget is no longer displaying on my screen. Enjoy my $2! That's the last of my money you will get.
Needs humidity in % and pressure measurement in inches of mercury. Not everyone goes by millibars.
Keeps me posted
The app works great on my Asus tablet.
Very nice app to have. So far very accurate with time and weather and weather conditions to be
May increase or decrease star
This is useful and a fun app
Keeps me posted
Nice app
Accurate and so adorable
Excellent animation
Very nice
Nice apps
Nice
Nice
Love it
Awesome

What's New

Added settings for refresh interval
Added settings for choosing the WAW Geocoder
Added setting for wind speed measure unit
Other Fixes
